channel.title: AKS-74u Textured
channel.description: http://i51.tinypic.com/2elegpe.jpg IDK I can't point out what's wrong with it, I'm applying for Savannah College of Art and Design next fall, this is going into my portfolio, can you give me some pointers?

item.title: AKS-74u Textured
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Maybe a little challenge for ya. Try to make a AK47 with a bit more design. May I suggest the Suppressed AK47 from Red Jacket?

@Model - You have definitely improved since I last came to the board. Might I request a wire-frame?

Read full topic

item.title: AKS-74u Textured
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

Textures don’t look dark enough to me, the metal and gold could be darker, it would make it more realistic…

Read full topic

item.title: AKS-74u Textured
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:13, topic:399344”][quote author=nsfpure link=topic=496481.msg3630238#msg3630238 date=1308159785]
the actual body of the gun is too squared and the detail on the side needs to be made 3d. but other then these few minor things… very nice =)

Good luck with your folio!
im going to be applying for a course in digital imagery in DCU (Dublin City University) when I finish school but atm im only 15
[/quote]

2ljjdp0.png921×536

Everything’s 3D except for the scratches.
Thanks good luck to you too.[/quote]
This looks nice. Talk to Frell about textures, I’m sure he can give you some strong pointers in the right direction.

Read full topic

item.title: AKS-74u Textured
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:7, topic:399344”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=496481.msg3629714#msg3629714 date=1308109356]

They just looks really… fake, really just plastered on there. Sure, in a game, you wouldn’t notice, but here, it’s clear. Make the mag color darker. Also, the ‘texture’ on the handle looks awkward. Wireframe too please?
[/quote]My wireframe is in the old AK74u thread.
You know what, I think the Mag is the wrong shade of orange. It’s not supposed to look gold. Thanks guys.
Does the wood grain seem realistic to you? I wasn’t sure how shiny waxed wood is.

Personally, I think the wood is the best part. At least texture/reality wise.[/quote]

Agree’d, try it again using a darker shade of colors.

Read full topic

item.title: AKS-74u Textured
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:6, topic:399344”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=496481.msg3629624#msg3629624 date=1308103735]
They just looks really… fake, really just plastered on there. Sure, in a game, you wouldn’t notice, but here, it’s clear. Make the mag color darker. Also, the ‘texture’ on the handle looks awkward. Wireframe too please?
[/quote]My wireframe is in the old AK74u thread.
You know what, I think the Mag is the wrong shade of orange. It’s not supposed to look gold. Thanks guys.
Does the wood grain seem realistic to you? I wasn’t sure how shiny waxed wood is.[/quote]
Personally, I think the wood is the best part. At least texture/reality wise.

Read full topic
